article_title: Meet The Italian Billionaire Calling The Shots At Walgreens

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: VideoFollowing the announcement of the retirement of Greg Wasson, 56, as president and chief executive officer of Walgreens (WAG), the future of the company is for now in the hands of Stefano Pessina, the Italian billionaire who by the end of this month becomes chief executive officer of the largest [...]
